title: Rationalizing the Denominator
text: Since we want to have the denominator be a whole number, we try to rationalize it.

title: Simplifying the Denominator
text: First, we check if the denominator is completely simplified.

title: Rationalizing the Denominator
text: If the denominator is simplified, we want to rationalize it by turning it into a whole number.

title: Multiplying the Numerator and Denominator
text: To do this, we complete the radical by multiplying the numerator and denominator by 1-(1/("its root")).

title: Rationalizing the Denominator
text: In our case, we multiply the numerator and denominator by $$\frac{\sqrt[2]{2}}{\sqrt[2]{2}}$$.
